itunes:title: #FBF - How to Make Entrepreneur Friends
title: #FBF - How to Make Entrepreneur Friends
description:
Emily and Kathleen discuss making friends as adults and busy business owners. They share where they find connections and how they prioritize genuine relationships. If you want to hear more of this conversation, check out Episode 88 - Prioritizing Relationships in Work + Life >>

—
